name: responsive-twitter-widget
author: engrmostafijur

sections.description:
Easy to configure responsive twitter widget .
Go to WordPress Dashboard Widget -> Drag drop responsive-twitter-widget Settings
Go to www.twitter.com and login here.
Go through user Settings and create a Widget here ,Collect widget ID here .

No need api key here.
Demo widget ID:592057989781016576
User Name:engrmostafijur

** Developed By **

Author: Md.Mostafijur Rahman
Author URI: http://pixelsolutionbd.com/
Support Email: engr.mostafijur@gmail.com
sections.installation:
** Install, Activate and widget setting**

  1. Unzip the downloaded responsive-twitter-widget zip Folder
  2. Upload the responsive-twitter-widget folder in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of WordPress directory
  3. Activate responsive-twitter-widget
  4. Go to www.twitter.com and login here.
  5. Go through user Settings and create a Widget here ,Collect widget ID here
    6.Go to Settings > Widgets > Create new
    7.Collect Id from the Browser: Example 592057989781016576 user name:engrmostafijur

** Widget Settings **

  1. Go to WP admin Widget page.
  2. Drag and drop “responsive-twitter-widget” into active sidebar.
sections.changelog:
1.0

There is no need consumer key,Secret key and API Secret key.
Just need widget ID and User name.
100% Responsive task.

short_description: Responsive twitter widget will be shown very smoothly. It is very easy to setup . We can go to widget and drag drop .
